question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-compiler-v2/src/pipeline/ability_processor.rs] [Function: process()] [Missing validation] Can a maliciously crafted FunctionData with corrupted annotations cause the processor to panic when calling expect() on missing LiveVarAnnotation, LifetimeAnnotation, or ExitStateAnnotation, leading to compiler DoS?
